description: This file is a Yocto recipe (.inc) for building Linux kernel headers version 3.14. It defines variables, dependencies, build tasks, and install procedures for integrating kernel headers into a build environment.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Runs the make command to configure the kernel headers without a full build.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Placeholder method for compilation step, currently empty.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the kernel headers and removes conflicting or unnecessary files.
